scripts.client: cd client && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "echo Client successfully run & npm start"
scripts.server: cd server && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "echo Server successfully run & npm start"
scripts.start: npm install && npm run client && npm run server
scripts.client_dev: cd client && start cmd.exe @cmd /k "echo Client successfully run & npm run dev"
scripts.server_dev: cd server &&  start cmd.exe @cmd /k "echo Server successfully run & npm run dev"
scripts.dev: npm install && npm run client_dev && npm run server_dev
